remarks: A continuous bijection from a compact space to a Hausdorff space is a homeomorphism.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Feb-2015.)
statement:
cmphaushmeo.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
cmphaushmeo.2 $e |- Y = U. K $.
cmphaushmeo $p |- ( ( J e. Comp /\ K e. Haus /\ F e. ( J Cn K ) ) -> ( F e. ( J Homeo K ) <-> F : X -1-1-onto-> Y ) ) $.
